meanings: (사람·동물 등이) sit (down), take[have] a seat, (formal) seat (oneself)
(새·곤충 등이) settle on, perch on, sit on

examples.korean: Lucy was sitting on the sofa, knitting. 발음듣기 루시는 소파에 앉아 뜨개질을 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Lucy was sitting on the sofa, knitting. 발음

examples.korean: We sat basking in the warm sunshine. 발음듣기 우리는 따스한 햇볕을 쪼이며 앉아 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We sat basking in the warm sunshine. 발음

examples.korean: He sat at the table stuffing himself. 발음듣기 그는 식탁에 앉아 음식을 잔뜩 먹고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He sat at the table stuffing himself. 발음

examples.korean: He sat nodding in front of the fire. 발음듣기 그는 난로 앞에 앉아 꾸벅꾸벅 졸고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He sat nodding in front of the fire. 발음

examples.korean: She rocked backwards and forwards on her chair. 발음듣기 그녀는 (흔들)의자에 앉아 앞뒤로 흔들흔들 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She rocked backwards and forwards on her chair. 발음
